programme.title: Um Amor Altura, (1970, Adventure)

programme.title: Vspera de Natal, (1970, Drama)

programme.title: Um Homem de Famlia, (1970, Drama)

programme.desc: O oficial sovitico Alexander Pechersky organiza uma revolta e uma fuga em massa dos prisioneiros de Sobibor, um campo de extermnio, em outubro de 1943.

programme.desc: O raro talento de se meter em problemas o legado da famlia de Kai e Gerda. Crescidos, os irmos se metem em um desastre de propores globais, tudo para encontrar seus pais que esto desaparecidos aps serem levados pelo Vento do Norte.

programme.title: Enquanto Houver Esperana, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Anglica uma adolescente de 16 anos que luta contra uma forma rara de cncer. E, enquanto seus pais batalham para custear seu tratamento e ganhar mais tempo de vida para a garota, ela se apaixona pela primeira vez.

programme.title: Jos, o Pai de Jesus - Coleo Bblia Sagrada, (1970, Drama)

programme.title: Sem Perdo, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Victor trabalha com um grande criminoso. Um dia, ele encontra Beatrice, vtima de um crime, que pede a ajuda de Victor para ajud-la em sua vingana. Para convenc-lo a cooperar, ela o chantageira com provas de um assassinato que Victor cometeu.

programme.title: Mfia dos Milionrios, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: A ascenso e queda de um cl da Camorra em Npoles, contada atravs dos olhos de um chefe do crime e sua famlia. Quarenta anos de vida de um homem, quarenta anos na histria de uma das mais belas e controversas cidades da Terra: Npoles.

programme.title: Perigo em Bangkok, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Joe um assassino que est na Tailndia para realizar quatro assassinatos sob encomenda. Os alvos so inimigos de Surat, um chefo do crime local. Para no ter que realizar o trabalho sozinho ele contrata Kong, um batedor de carteiras.

programme.title: O Homem da Mfia, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Um assalto a um jogo de pquer ilegal, cujos participantes eram integrantes da mfia, abala o mundo do crime. Um matador profissional contratado para investigar o caso, mas a hesitao de alguns dos participantes coloca a situao fora de controle.

programme.title: Sombra, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: Esta a histria de uma me que, apesar de todos os obstculos que encontra, no aceita desistir de lutar para encontrar o seu filho de 11 anos, que desapareceu de forma misteriosa.

programme.title: O ltimo assalto, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Trs idosos veteranos do crime decidem participar de um roubo a um cofre subterrneo do depsito de jias Hatton Garden, em Londres. Com uma furadeira industrial, os criminosos planejam entrar para a Histria atravessando as paredes do cofre em dois dias.

programme.title: O Franco-Atirador, (2015, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Depois de uma longa carreira como matador de aluguel, Martin Terrier pretende se aposentar e passar o resto da vida ao lado de sua amada. Mas ele descobre que est sendo trado por pessoas de sua confiana!

programme.title: Aposta Mxima, (2013, Thriller)
programme.desc: Estudante acredita que foi enganado e vai Costa Rica enfrentar magnata.

programme.title: A Filha do General, (1999, Drama)
programme.desc: Dois investigadores do Exrcito revelam um escndalo multilateral quando provam o assassinato brutal de um oficial.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Volta Do Kazekage
programme.desc: As habilidades de Naruto e Sakura foram Kakashi a usar seu sharingan imediatamente. Naruto lana um jutsu aps outro. Sakura usa tcnicas ensinadas a ela por Tsunade. Deidara da Akatsuki comea uma operao secreta para se infiltrar na Aldeia da Areia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Alvo
programme.desc: Gaara percebe a presena de Deidara e comea uma batalha area na areia. O jonin da areia Yura, um agente da Akatsuki, e a Aldeia da Areia sofre danos. Na Aldeia da Folha, Naruto e Sakura veem o incrvel poder de Kakashi. A dupla d seu golpe final.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Formao! A Nova Equipe Kakashi
programme.desc: Naruto e Sakura derrotam Kakashi. Tsunade os nomeia como uma equipe de trs liderados por Kakashi, dizendo que agora so todos iguais. Gaara e Deidara continuam sua batalha. Baki fica preocupado que o shukaku se materialize, mas Kankuro ri da ideia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Adio Indesejada
programme.desc: Para proteger sua aldeia da argila explosiva de Deidara, Gaara usa seu chakra para criar um escudo. A aldeia salva a um enorme custo. Gaara fica vulnervel. As tentativas de seus companheiros so inteis, e Gaara acaba caindo nas mos de Deidara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Falso Sorriso
programme.desc: Gaara arrastado para longe por Deidara. Kankuro sai com um peloto para salvar Gaara, mas os Akatsuki haviam instalado armadilhas engenhosas. Determinado, Kankuro encontra sozinho os Akatsuki. A nova equipe de Naruto comemora sua primeira misso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sem Ttulo
programme.desc: Temari encontra Kakashi e sua equipe. Naruto explode de raiva pelos Akatsuki. Como tambm hospeda uma besta de cauda dentro de si, Naruto entende o que Gaara est sofrendo. Kankuro infectado por um veneno. Sem um antdoto, ele ter poucos dias de vida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Simulao
programme.desc: Chega uma mensagem da Aldeia da Areia sobre o sequestro do Kazekage. Tsunade manda a equipe Kakashi para a aldeia. Kankuro comea a batalha contra os Akatsuki, mas as tticas dos bonecos no funcionam. Seu oponente foi quem desenvolveu essas tticas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Ponte Tenchi
programme.desc: Os ninjas tentam salvar Kankuro. Vov Chiyo, perita em veneno, chamada. Uma tempestade de areia atrasa Naruto, Sakura e Kakashi. Tsunade se preocupa e envia Guy e sua equipe. O akatsuki e Gaara comeam o jutsu de selamento e os nove drages fantasmas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Nove Caudas Se Liberta
programme.desc: Sakura trata Kankuro, deixando todos espantados com suas mos firmes. Vov Chiyo fica emocionada por Tsunade ter enviado sua prpria aprendiz e pela determinao de Sakura. Kankuro fornece informaes sobre os Akatsuki. Kakashi envia um co de caa ninja.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia
programme.desc: Pakkun acha o esconderijo dos Akatsuki. Temari recebe ordens para ajudar a proteger a aldeia. Vov Chiyo se oferece para ficar no lugar de Temari. Naruto e Sakura ficam chocados com a histria das bestas de cauda.
programme.sub-title: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Orochimaru Versus Jinchuriki
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi encontra Itachi Uchiha, de quem sofrera uma amarga derrota no passado. Guy e sua equipe comeam a lutar contra um amargo rival, Kisame, que lana um poderoso chakra para subjugar o ninja da folha. Seu jutsu aprisiona Neji, Lee e Tenten.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Lgrimas De Sakura
programme.desc: Guy se arrepende ao ver seus trs alunos presos. Determinado a parar Kisame, Guy o desafia usando o nunchaku. Sem oxignio, Tenten vai ficando fraca, e Guy se prepara para usar um jutsu secreto e proibido. Naruto cai no genjutsu de Itachi.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Segredo Da Batalha
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo e Sakura salvam Naruto do genjutsu de Itachi. Kakashi comea um contra-ataque e exibe toda sua destreza. Guy enfrenta dificuldades contra Kisame, mas o derrota com um poderoso jutsu. Os ninjas da folha conseguem derrotar seu arquiminigo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Consequncias Da Traio
programme.desc: Kisame e Itachi parecem ter sido clones cujos poderes foram copiados por um jutsu de personificao. Vov Chiyo explica a conexo entre a besta de cauda e o jinchuriki. Sakura percebe que Naruto enfrenta o mesmo destino e lgrimas escorrem em seu rosto.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Pgina Inacabada
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy fazem uma pausa. Quando a perseguio recomea, Kakashi explica a Chiyo que Naruto tambm um jinchuriki. Chiyo lamenta ter sido ela que selou o shukaku dentro de Gaara... Gaara engolfado por uma luz branca.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Infiltrao: O Covil Da Cobra!
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy chegam ao esconderijo dos akatsuki, mas so parados por uma barreira de cinco selos. Neji usa seu byakugan para localizar os selos e os ninjas destroem a barreira. Naruto tem uma viso chocante. A equipe Guy encara uma armadilha.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Laos
programme.desc: Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e a equipe Guy enfrenta cpias idnticas de si mesmos. Deidara e Sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki. Forado a seguir Naruto, Kakashi pede que vov Chiyo e Sakura no faam nada precipitado.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Algo Importante...
programme.desc: A luta entre av e neto comea. Para derrotar o verdadeiro Sasori dentro do boneco, Hiruko deve ser destrudo primeiro. S a prpria av consegue entender as armadilhas complexas de Sasori, mas Sakura que deve dar o golpe final. Que estratgia usaro?

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Histria Do lbum Ilustrado
programme.desc: Chiyo e Sakura expem Sasori, que no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos. Chiyo fica mais chocada com o segundo boneco que Sasori revela. Sasori foi quem planejou o desaparecimento do kazecage. Uma equipe ninja se dirige a um certo local.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Reencontro
programme.desc: Sakura fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno e usa um papel bomba para se livrar da fumaa. Ela tenta capturar Sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre Orochimaru, invocando dois bonecos para esta batalha. Naruto e Kakashi ainda perseguem Deidara!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Poder De Uchiha
programme.desc: Os bonecos criados de humanos podem comandar o jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo. Assim, o boneco do terceiro kazekage converte chakras em poderes magnticos. Chiyo e Sakura se protegem, Sasori faz um ataque implacvel. Sakura toma uma deciso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ttulo
programme.desc: Sakura revida o ataque da areia de ferro. Ela rapidamente comea a ler os padres de ataque do Sasori, que se prepara para usar seu chakra. O ataque da areia de ferro penetra o espao, Sakura atingida na mo e infectada pelo veneno!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pesadelo
programme.desc: Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto que ela tomou e que funciona durante cerca de trs minutos. Chiyo e Sakura decidem derrotar Sasori nesse prazo. Sasori usa seu ltimo trunfo. Naruto e Kakashi planejam capturar Deidara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Vento
programme.desc: Sakura e Vov Chiyo derrotam Sasori, mas ele acaba revivendo. Chiyo invoca bonecos com a tcnica do ataque branco secreto, e Sasori aplica seu ataque vermelho secreto. O antdoto de Sakura perde efeito, mas ela e Chiyo iniciam uma decisiva batalha final!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contoro
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo usa o ltimo antdoto em Sakura. Sasori tenta pr fim vida de Vov Chiyo, mas ela revida e o derrota. Sakura atingida em um lugar vital, e a nica coisa que pode salv-la um jutsu que a Vov Chiyo criou uma vez para Sasori.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Despertar Do Sono Eterno
programme.desc: Os ninjas da equipe Guy se preocupam com o resultado da luta de Sakura e Vov Chiyo enquanto enfrentam suas cpias, que permanecem firmes! Naruto segue Deidara, que se apoderou de Gaara. A preparao para a nova tcnica de Kakashi est em andamento!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Solido
programme.desc: Sakura corre para achar Naruto com Vov Chiyo, sofrendo envenenada. Kakashi revela seu mangekyo sharingan, um poderoso jutsu que transporta tudo o que o olho pode ver para outra dimenso. Naruto finalmente consegue salvar Gaara, mas fica enfurecido ...

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Inimigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde o controle e o esprito da Raposa de Nove Caudas assume o comando. Kakashi consegue suprimir a Raposa de Nove Caudas. Deidara descobre a derrota de Sasori. A equipe Guy cerca Deidara, que tenta se explodir junto com os ninjas da folha!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Impermanncia
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo realiza o jutsu de ressuscitao em Gaara. Gaara acorda cercado por Naruto e os outros e tambm por uma multido de ninjas da areia. Percebendo a verdade por trs do jutsu de ressuscitao, todos demonstram seu respeito por Chiyo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contato
programme.desc: Gaara e seus salvadores retornam Aldeia de Areia. Aps visitar o tmulo de Vov Chiyo, Naruto e os ninjas da Folha tm que partir. Deidara aparece ferido na frente de Zetsu e Tobi. Na Aldeia da Folha, algum tenta infiltrar um garoto na equipe Kakashi!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Companheiro De Equipe!
programme.desc: Kakashi hospitalizado devido tenso causada por seu mangekyo sharinga. Apesar dos apelos de Shizune para enviar outra equipe, Tsunade afirma que enviar a equipe Kakashi para fazer o trabalho.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Reis
programme.desc: Sai diz que ele e Naruto se encontraro de novo e desaparece. Homura e Koharu dizem a Tsunade que Naruto no deve ser enviado em misses envolvendo a Akatsuki. Tsunade no concorda, ento eles exigem que ela adicione um ninja recomendado por Danzo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Sinal De Fogo Preto
programme.desc: Naruto fica enfurecido ao saber que Sai o atacou para test-lo. Tsunade, Jiraiya, Yamatoe e Shizune se reunem no quarto de Kakashi. Jiraiya expe o comportamento despreocupado de Naruto. Sai recebe um envelope misterioso do setor operacional da fundao.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Presa Na Escurido
programme.desc: A nova equipe Kakashi segue em direo ponte Tenchi. Quando Sai mostra seu desprezo por Sasuke, o antagonismo com Naruto aumenta. Yamato decide que eles passaro a noite em uma pousada para tentar melhorar as relaes entre os membros de sua equipe.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Almas Ressuscitadas
programme.desc: Sakura v Sai trabalhando em uma pintura abstrata e encontra um livro de desenhos incomum no meio das coisas dele. Enquanto vo em direo ponte Tenchi, eles se mantm atentos contra qualquer emboscada. Yamato orienta sua equipe caso uma luta acontea.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.sub-title: Misso em Parceria com a Aldeia da Areia

programme.desc: Shikadai, que j sentiu o poder aterrorizante de Deepa, diz a Boruto que uma revanche com Deepa seria imprudente.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Sob a superviso de Kakashi, Boruto consegue desenvolver o seu prprio estilo de Rasengan. Sasuke e Sakura trocam de lugar para treinar a filha.

programme.desc: Iwabe, Denki e Metal visitam Boruto no hospital aps ele ter treinado demais.

programme.desc: Boruto, Sarada e Mitsuki devem prosseguir com as misses da Equipe 7 por conta prpria, at Konohamaru voltar de uma misso inesperada.

programme.desc: A Equipe 7 recebe uma misso para escoltar Katasuke e transportar uma Ferramenta Cientfica Ninja. Preso em uma misso que no queria, Boruto encontra Ao abordo do Trem Trovo.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto Uzumaki, filho do lder da aldeia, salva um garoto chamado Denki Kaminarimon, que est sendo incomodado por valentes.

programme.desc: Depois de ser suspenso pela baguna na cerimnia de entrada, Boruto vai para a academia pela primeira vez.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.desc: Um Jutsu Visual coloca Boruto dentro de um sonho. Depois disso, Boruto passa a afirmar que o sonho fez despertar seu Byakugan, o Kekkei Genkai do cl Hyuga, de sua me.

programme.desc: De repente, os Incidentes de Fantasmas param, deixando Boruto e seus colegas de classe intrigados. No entanto, parece que Mitsuki sabe de algo que eles no sabem.

programme.desc: O dia da prova est cada vez mais prximo e todos da Academia esto se preparando. Quem falhar ter que repetir a srie.

programme.desc: Sarada concorda em entregar um ursinho de pelcia para um paciente no hospital, mas acaba esquecendo o urso no trem e entra em pnico.

programme.title: Naruto and the others tend to an injured Sazanami. As Sazanami tells it, he had once been a swordsmith in a peaceful town and was framed for a murder committed by Gosunkugi.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: While Guy and Lee are away, two impostors dressed like them sneak into Hidden Leaf Village.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Land of Birds is in turmoil due to a specter known as the Cursed Warrior, which is believed to be the ghost of Lord Owashi, the previous feudal lord who died suddenly.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Moso, the late feudal lords counselor, and Komei, the chief strategist, are at odds with each other. Neji begins to think that the Cursed Warrior is part of a plot
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Komei is controlling the Cursed Warrior. Moso thwarts Komei's ambitions. The Leaf team feels uneasy about his motives. Neji doesn't want to get involved, but Naruto is defiant. Gamakichi and Gamatatsu are summoned to investigate
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Tenten and Neji have no choice but to listen to Kakashi. He senses that their being followed. Komei has been declared a criminal and is to be executed. The Cursed Warrior appears and snatches Komei away.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sagi swears to punish Moso himself. Naruto is reminded of Sasuke when he sees Sagi. Neither words nor Naruto's attempts to stop him can deter Sagi from his chosen path of revenge.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: At Moso's mansion, a battle takes place between the Wandering Ninja and a Leaf Ninja. With Chishima's help, Naruto is freed from Moso's genjutsu. Moso then reveals his true form as the leader of the Wandering ninja, Hoki!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Choji and Naruto are craving Ichiraku's special ramen only to find out that they find the shop closed! Teuchi reveals that his daughter has been kidnapped by Ryonin, aka the Ninja Chefs, who is after his secret recipes!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Demon of the Ocean is wreaking havoc in the Land of the Sea. Anko leads a team consisting of Naruto, Ino, and Shino. It turns out Anko has an unexpected history with the Land of the Sea.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Unable to find Naruto, Anko meets with officials from the Land of the Sea. The ship carrying government funds that they were supposed to guard sets sail the next day!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: As soon as she awakens, Anko begins to remember Demon Island, a place once visited with her former sensei, Orochimaru. Anko reveals the truth behind the disappearances and the secret behind Isaribi's body.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Amachi and his gang begin their attack on the government ship. Naruto and the others escape from Demon Island, but the sight that greets them is the Land of the Sea fleet on the verge of annihilation.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Hidden Leaf ninja and Amachi battle it out at sea. With Naruto's help, Amachi is defeated, but then a monster appears. Naruto summons Gamabunta in order to defeat the monster.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kunijiro visits Tsunade and decides to have Naruto guide his boy through one day in the life of a ninja!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Kiba, and Hinata are searching for buried treasure at the request of Tsunade's friend Agari Kaisen. Thinking its an easy task since they have a map, Tsunade threatens to send them back to the Academy if they fail.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After escaping from the cave, Naruto and the others chase after the Kedouin in order to put a halt to their plot, but the Village Hidden in the Leaves is already under attack.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Departed, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: Set in Boston, this police thriller follows a gangster who infiltrates the police department and a cop who infiltrates the gang simultaneously. The two find out that a mole exists within the organizations and race to uncover each other's identity.

programme.title: Reindeer Games, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Just one week before Christmas, after serving six years in jail, an ex-con is forced to take part in a deadly casino heist. Ben Affleck, Charlize Theron, and Gary Sinise star in this action-packed crime thriller from director John Frankenheimer.

programme.title: Go, (1999, Screwball)
programme.desc: Ronna needs to make some extra cash. Simon wants to escape to Vegas for the weekend. Adam and Zack want to stay out of trouble. But it's not just another night in the life of these unusual characters.

programme.title: P2, (2007, Thriller)
programme.desc: A woman who is the last to leave her office on Christmas Eve must rely on her wits to survive when she is trapped in a parking garage with a deranged security guard.

programme.title: Reindeer Games, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Just one week before Christmas, after serving six years in jail, an ex-con is forced to take part in a deadly casino heist. Ben Affleck, Charlize Theron, and Gary Sinise star in this action-packed crime thriller from director John Frankenheimer.

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Drama)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: Mario Puzo's The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: Director/screenwriter Francis Ford Coppola's definitive new edit and restoration of THE GODFATHER: PART III, with remastered picture and sound. Michael Corleone (Pacino) seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Sam Childers is a former drug-dealing, biker, tough guy who found God and becomes a crusader for hundreds of Sudanese children who've been forced to become soldiers.

programme.title: Everybody's Fine, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: When Frank Goode's (Robert DeNiro) children cancel a family reunion, the widower sets off on a cross-country journey to reconnect with them. Expecting to share in the joys of their happy lives, his visits reveal a picture that's far from perfect.

programme.title: Nothing Like the Holidays, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: The far-flung members of the Rodriguez family converge at their parents' home to face what may be their last Christmas together in this heart-warming holiday comedy.

programme.title: A Merry Friggin' Christmas, (2014, Screwball)
programme.desc: Boyd and his family are forced to spend a dreaded Christmas at his parents' house with his eccentric father that he has been avoiding for years.

programme.title: All Is Bright, (2012, Comedy)
programme.desc: Starring Paul Rudd and Oscar-nominee Paul Giamatti. Two low-level con men attempt to pull off one last job: selling Christmas trees in New York City.

programme.title: Green Room, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: After witnessing a shocking crime, a young rock band is unexpectedly thrust into a life-or-death battle to escape the clutches of a diabolical club owner (Patrick Stewart) and his ruthless henchmen in this white-knuckle thriller.

programme.title: The Green Knight, (2021, Fantasy)
programme.desc: An epic fantasy adventure based on the timeless Arthurian legend, The Green Knight tells the story of Sir Gawain, King Arthur's reckless and headstrong nephew, who embarks on a daring quest to confront the eponymous Green Knight.

programme.title: Room, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: Kidnapped and confined to a windowless room, Ma uses imagination to give Jack a fulfilling life. At a breaking point, they enact a risky plan to escape which ultimately brings them face-to-face with the scariest thing yet: the real world.

programme.title: Moonlight, (2016, Drama)
programme.desc: A look at three defining chapters in the life of Chiron, a young Black man growing up in Miami. His epic journey to manhood is guided by the kindness, support, and love of the community that helps raise him.

programme.title: Amistad, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: AMISTAD is about a 1839 mutiny onboard a slave ship that is traveling towards the Northeast Coast of America. Much of the story involves a court-room drama about the slave who led the revolt.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Mike and Carol have just one week to come up with $20,000 in back taxes, or theyll lose their house to a neighbor. Even worse, Marcia gets a swollen nose on date night, Cindys addicted to tattling, and Jans hearing a psychotic inner voice.

programme.title: The Addams Family, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: Come join The Addams Family for the most hilarious scarefest of this season or any other! When long-lost Uncle Fester reappears after twenty-five years in the Bermuda Triangle, Gomez and Morticia plan a celebration to wake the dead.

programme.title: Addams Family Values, (1993, Screwball)
programme.desc: The familys future grows bleak when the no-good nanny marries Fester and has the kids shipped off to summer camp. But Wednesday still has a Thing or two up her sleeve.

programme.title: Miracle on 34th Street, (1994, Drama)
programme.desc: 6-year-old Susan meets Kriss Kringle, a department store Santa who thinks he's the genuine article.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Mike and Carol have just one week to come up with $20,000 in back taxes, or theyll lose their house to a neighbor. Even worse, Marcia gets a swollen nose on date night, Cindys addicted to tattling, and Jans hearing a psychotic inner voice.

programme.title: Blankman, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: In Living Color's favorite team of Damon Wayans and David Alan Grier joins Robin Givens, Jon Polito and Jason Alexander in this hilarious crime-fighting comedy about two slapstick heroes who triumph over evil... more or less. Rated PG-13

programme.title: Idle Hands, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: The devil will find work for idle hands to do, but what happens when he chooses the laziest teen slacker in the world to do his dirty work? Anton Tobias is a couch potato burn-out who can't control the murderous impulses of his possessed hand. Rated: R

programme.title: Save The Tiger, (1973, Drama)
programme.desc: Jack Lemmon plays Harry Stoner, a man caught in violent collision with his past and present life. He believes there is nothing significant in his life except survival, and that instinct pushes him beyond moral conduct.

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Drama)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: Save The Tiger, (1973, Drama)
programme.desc: Jack Lemmon plays Harry Stoner, a man caught in violent collision with his past and present life. He believes there is nothing significant in his life except survival, and that instinct pushes him beyond moral conduct.

programme.title: Foxy Brown, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: A blaxploitation film about a woman whose drug-dealing brother ratted on her undercover narcotics-agent boyfriend to the mob and she, in turn, poses as a call girl to infiltrate the mobsters who butchered him.

programme.title: Marathon Man, (1976, Thriller)
programme.desc: Dustin Hoffman plays the likable graduate student and marathon runner of the title, unwillingly trapped in a killing game of intrigue involving a Nazi fugitive, Christian Szell.

programme.title: Serpico, (1973, Thriller)
programme.desc: A true-life drama of a cop whose revelations about the extent of bribery in the New York Police Department almost led to his death and resulted in the creation of the Knapp Commission.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Dark Magician versus Dark Magician! However, while Yugi only controls one Dark Magician, Arkana has three residing in his deck. Though outnumbered, Yugi will never give up as long as he believes in the heart of the cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: To counter Arkana's Dark Magician, Yugi pulls a rabbit out of his hat: the Dark Magician Girl!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The trickster Weevil Underwood spins a web of lies to bait Joey into a lopsided duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey swats Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth only to have Weevil let loose the ferocious Insect Queen, the crown jewel of insects that grows in strength for every creepy crawler it cannibalizes. Will Weevil's royal ravager swarm Joey into submission?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against another of Marik's nefarious Rare Hunters, the silent but deadly Strings.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Strings summons one of the most powerful creatures in the history of Duel Monsters: the Egyptian God Monster Slifer the Sky Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magic card Infinite Cards allows Strings to hold an unlimited number of cards in his hand.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the sea duelist Mako Tsunami and his bevy of underwater beasts. If Joey wins, he'll have all six Locator Cards necessary to enter the Battle City Finals, but if he loses, he can kiss the finals goodbye.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mako's oceanic warrior, The Legendary Fisherman, unleashes a wave of destruction by stealthily destroying Joey's monsters from the depths of the sea. Joey has to put his skills, training, and experience to the ultimate test before he's all washed out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik, with the help of Bakura, kidnaps Joey and Tea. The Rare Hunters also kidnap Mokuba to force Yugi and Kaiba to take on tag team duelists Umbra and Lumis on top of a skyscraper. The losers will be sent plummeting into the Shadow Realm.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 1 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Lumis and Umbra systematically dismantle Yugi and Kaiba's tumultuous teamwork. Can Yugi and Kaiba learn to put their differences aside before they're sent on a one-way trip into the Shadow Realm?
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 2 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba start to exhibit signs of teamwork, but it's too little too late when Umbra and Lumis summon Masked Beast Des Gardius.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 3 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi combines his magnetic monsters into the polar powerhouse Valkyrion the Magna Warrior!
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 4 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba are on a rescue mission to save their friends. But along the way, all their worries and secrets are revealed as they relive the troubles they've faced and will face in the future.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's friend versus friend as Marik mind controls Joey to duel against Yugi. The loser will be dragged into the ocean to sleep with the fishes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Though Joey decimates Yugi's life points, Yugi can't bring himself to attack his dear friend. Yugi summons Joey's favorite monster Red-Eyes Black Dragon to bring Joey back to his senses.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi starts to break Marik's spell over Joey, but he now must duel without the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: There's only one minute left in the duel before the loser is sent plummeting to the depths of the sea. Will these best friends actually send each other to their doom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the battle of the ghouls as Bakura unleashes his army of ghosts against Bonz's zealous zombies for the right to enter the Battle City finals. But for whom will the final bell toll when this duel is played in the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the game of love as Hollywood heartthrob Jean-Claude Magnum challenges Mai to a duel in order to win her hand in marriage.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Let the Battle City finals begin! The eight finalists have their skill and endurance put to the ultimate test in a dueling arena thousands of feet in the sky.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the first duel of the Battle City finals as Yugi squares off against the evil spirit of the Millennium Ring who possessed Bakura. Yugi quickly disposes of Bakura's grotesque ghouls, but Bakura has a sinister strategy straight from the graveyard.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bakura activates Destiny Board, which will cause Yugi to lose automatically in five turns. If that's not bad enough, Bakura's Dark Sanctuary damages Yugi's Life Points every time Yugi attacks. Unable to attack and running out of time, Yugi's trapped.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon is about to unleash the final blow to win the duel, but Bakura may not survive the blast from the almighty Egyptian God Monster. Will Yugi attack and advance in the finals or will he surrender to save Bakura's life?
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of the Egyptian God Cards is finally revealed. The mysterious Shadi takes Yugi on a journey back in time to the creation of Duel Monsters and the dangerous powers it released.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the second duel of the Battle City finals, Odion, disguised as Marik, befuddles Joey with numerous traps to bring the duel to a stalemate. However, Joey has Giant Trunade, the perfect counter to Odion's strategy.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion's Embodiments of Apophis run roughshod over Joey's monsters and his Life Points. Can Joey effectively utilize the monsters he won earlier in the tournament, or is he too flustered to mount a successful counterattack?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a feeding frenzy as Odion's Mystical Beast Selket devours Joey's monsters to morph into greater and powerful stages of evolution! How can Joey defeat Selket when it ingests Joey's monsters whenever they're summoned on to the field?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion uses a phony Egyptian God Card to summon the third Egyptian God Monster, The Winged Dragon of Ra, targeted to annihilate the rest of Joey's Life Points.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The third duel of the Battle City finals between Mai and Marik is no ordinary duel; it's a battle in the dreaded Shadow Realm where losing Life Points equals losing your memories.
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 1: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Mai loses more memories under Marik's relentless assault, she loses confidence in her dueling abilities. Will Yugi and friends' never-ending support bring her back to victory, or will her shattered mind be trapped in the Shadow Realm for eternity?
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 2: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai gains control of Marik's The Winged Dragon of Ra, but she's unable to decipher how to unleash its massively powerful abilities. Can Mai solve the mystery of the Egyptian God Card before Marik solves it himself?
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 3: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the fourth duel of the Battle City finals, Kaiba's mystery opponent is Ishizu. With the power of her Millennium Necklace, Ishizu can see the future, including every card Kaiba is planning to play.
programme.sub-title: A Duel with Destiny Part 1: Kaiba vs. Ishizu

programme.title: Ulti and Page One of the Tobi Roppo chase Nami and Usopp, after being infuriated by their attack as well as Luffy's declaration of becoming the King of the Pirates. Cornered, Nami gives in and Ulti pushes her to say the unthinkable.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Carrot and Wanda step in to help Marco, who is cornered by Big Mom and Perospero. In the meantime, Yamato fights a fierce battle against the Animal Kingdom Pirates Armored Division led by Sasaki, while protecting Shinobu and Momonosuke.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sasakis Onslaught! Armored Division vs. Yamato!

programme.title: Zoro and Drake continue to chase Apoo to get the antibody against Ice Oni, while Chopper is trying to figure out how to fight the virus.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Eliminate the Ice Oni! Choppers Fire Trick!

programme.title: Sanji hears a woman's scream for help and dashes into the room the scream can be heard from. However, it's a trap set up by Black Maria of the Tobi Roppo. Meanwhile, Luffy and Jimbei who are trying to reach the rooftop get help from the unexpected.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Its Not Okay! The Spider lures Sanji!

programme.title: While Kaido begins the New Onigashima Project, Marco appears in front of Chopper and the others, who are struggling with Ice Oni. The members of the Tobi Roppo continue to give the Straw Hats a hard time while their former member helps Zoro.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Turnaround Move! The Flames of Marco the Phoenix!

programme.title: Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu that he once confronted a man, who came to Onigashima looking to get Kaido's head. His name was Ace. The two of them engaged in a fierce battle that eventually turned into an important friendship.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Yamatos Past! The Man Who Came for an Emperor of the Sea!

programme.title: The formidable Lead Performers of the Animal Kingdom Pirates stand in Zoro's way as he tries to get to the rooftop. Marco sees his late comrade in Zoro's determination and tries to pave the way for him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Marcos Tears! The Bond of the Whitebeard Pirates!

programme.title: Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu about how Ace gave him hope for the future. Meanwhile, Luffy and the other allied pirates from the Worst Generation make it to the rooftop to finally face off against Kaido and Big Mom.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Straw Hat Luffy! The Man Who Will Become the King of the Pirates!

programme.title: Luffy's strong attack reminds Kaido of all the strong ones he's ever met. On the other hand, Luffy, Law, and Kid keep quarreling amongst themselves. Meanwhile, Sanji is caught and interrogated by Black Maria in what he calls "heaven."
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Battle of the Monsters! The Three Stubborn Captains!

programme.title: Luffy, Law, Kid, Zoro, and Killer keep landing hard blows against Kaido in tandem despite the arguing. However, when Big Mom steps in and unleashes powerful lightning strikes, the tide turns for all except one of the rookies.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Barrage of Powerful Techniques! The Fierce Attacks of the Worst Generation!

programme.title: Luffy pummels Kaido with his well-trained Kong Gatling and delivers a final blow using all his strength. Big Mom tries to fight back, but Law gets in her way and Kid and Killer also try to finish Kaido off.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Kaido Laughs! The Emperors of the Sea vs. the New Generation!

programme.title: After watching the Straw Hats' departure to Onigashima, Tama wondered if there was anything she could do to help the Straw Hats and the samurai. Now that she's here on Onigashima, it's time to execute her powerful plan Operation Kibi Dango!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Otamas Secret Plan! Operation Kibi Dango!

programme.title: Sanji is captured and tortured by the merciless Black Maria. She names the terms of his release: to turn over one of his crewmates. He hesitates but has no other option. After much distress, he makes a move that surprises everyone.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sanjis Scream! An SOS Echoes Over the Island!

programme.title: Robin bursts in to rescue Sanji along with Brook, and faces Black Maria, who is trying to keep Sanji as her pet. Meanwhile, Yamato, Momonosuke, and Shinobu are spotted hiding by the enemy, and they find themselves on the run again.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Chopper works hard to make the cure for Ice Oni, even though he is turning into one himself. Meanwhile, the infected Boss Hyogoro the Flower regains his youth and fights fiercely to protect Chopper and the others.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: No Regrets! Luffy and Boss, a Master-Disciple Bond!

programme.title: Seeing everyone turning into Ice Oni, there is nothing that the samurai warriors can do other than grieve. However, it wasn't just them who were devastated by Queen's raging virus. When their desperation and frustration peak, they hear a hopeful voice.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The wounded Akazaya members are surprised to see Kozuki Oden alive. They were disappointed by their failure to take down Kaido, but now with their lord, they are filled with hope to face their sworn enemy again.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Oden Appears! The Confused Hearts of the Akazaya Members!

programme.title: The Akazaya members run to save Momonosuke, but an unexpected contender stands in their way. Queen gets infuriated after Chopper ruined his plot and goes after him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Worst Generation Gets Wiped Out?! The Emperors Deadly Attack!

programme.title: The returned Orochi clashes the Akazaya members who are trying to save Momonosuke. Meanwhile, Luffy and the others are all covered in bruises, but they unite their strength and launch an attack.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Supernovas Strike Back! The Mission to Tear Apart the Emperors!

programme.title: Even after Big Mom was pushed off of the island, Zoro and the others keep fighting the exhausting battle against Kaido. When Kaido tries to beat up the unconscious Luffy, Zoro launches an all-out attack at the risk of his life.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Defend Luffy! Zoro and Laws Sword Technique!

programme.title: Luffy remembers how he was advised by his friends, how he was saved by his comrades, and the frustrations of being defeated. As Kaido mocks him to his face, the Color of the Supreme King Haki gushes out and they clash again.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Surpass the Emperor of the Sea! Luffy Strikes Back with an Iron Fist!

programme.title: Countless souls have been lured along the Grand Line in pursuit of the legendary One Piece! Luffy D. Monkey is a young pirate with a dream: to prove the legend true and be king of them all!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I'm Luffy! The Man Who's Gonna Be King of the Pirates!

programme.title: Luffy and his new companion Coby set sail in search of the infamous pirate hunter Zoro, rumored to be held captive at the Marine Base.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Enter the Great Swordsman! Pirate Hunter Roronoa Zoro!

programme.title: Luffy is in the line of fire after saving Zoro, and now tyrannical Captain Morgan is out for their heads! Zoro must decide if he will join forces with Luffy or die in captivity.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Morgan versus Luffy! Who's the Mysterious Pretty Girl?

programme.title: Luffy recalls a time when Captain Red-Haired Shanks taught him a valuable lesson in friendship and set him on his quest to be King of the Pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy crosses paths with the clever thief Nami. A navigator on a quest to collect one hundred million berries, shes perfect for Luffys new crew except for the fact that Nami hates pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Terrifying Mysterious Power! Captain Buggy, the Clown Pirate!

programme.title: Having delivered a deadly blow to Captain Buggys pirates, Luffy and his companions need a place to recuperate. But the three are not in hiding very long before the Beast Tamer Mohji seeks them out.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Desperate Situation! Beast Tamer Mohji vs. Luffy!

programme.title: In the ongoing fight with Captain Buggys pirates, Zoro must face off with the Acrobat Cabaji while Luffy continues to do battle with the Pirate Clown himself.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Epic Showdown! Swordsman Zoro vs. Acrobat Cabaji!

programme.title: Luffy and the gang are on the run after the battle with Captain Buggy! With no place to go and nothing else to do, Nami finally agrees to join Luffy on his quest.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Who is the Victor? Devil Fruit Power Showdown!

programme.title: Luffy, Zoro, and Nami arrive at an island hoping to obtain a ship and crew, but the three are quickly confronted with the blustering Captain Usopp who has a connection to Luffys past.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy follows Usopp to the mansion and encounters the brutal pirate Captain Kuro. The scoundrel plans to claim Kayas fortune and live the stolen life of luxury.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Weirdest Guy Ever! Jango the Hypnotist!

programme.title: Usopp spreads the word of Kuros evil plot and the impending pirate attack, but no one believes his warnings. The Straw Hat Pirates decide to help Usopp put a stop to the dastardly scheme.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Expose the Plot! Pirate Butler, Captain Kuro!

programme.title: Luffy and crew seek to best Captain Kuro, but theyve prepared their defense on the wrong side of the island! All looks grim now that Usopp must face off against the Black Cat Pirates alone.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Clash with the Black Cat Pirates! The Great Battle on the Slope!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Bye Bye, Lady Liberty
programme.desc: Foiled repeatedly by the predictions of Interpol's supercomputer, professional looter Lupin III has settled down. A sinister secret organization and a young computer genius are thrown into the mix. And whose side is the buxom Fujiko on this time?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Hemingway Papers
programme.desc: The legendary last manuscript of the great Ernest Hemingway tells of a buried treasure on an island far away and thief extraordinaire Lupin is on the trail! But he gets caught up in a local civil war, Lupin will have to keep his wits or risk his life!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Napoleon's Dictionary
programme.desc: Lupin learns of his grandfather's secret treasure, supposedly hidden in the pages of a dictionary previously owned by Napoleon Bonaparte! Said dictionary just happens to be the prize in a cross-country classic car race.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: From Siberia With Love
programme.desc: Ultimate thief Lupin III has a new target: the lost gold of the Romanov dynasty! With the help of a mysterious blonde named Judy Scott, Lupin discovers the treasure hidden in Texas, at the Bank of Liberty.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: It's been a long time since Jigen, Goemon and Fujiko have heard from Lupin. Then one day, they each receive an invitation from Lupin for a reunion aboard the luxury liner Sirloin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An international soccer game is taking place in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil and Lupin has his eyes on the box office and betting takes. Will the box office heist go as planned?
programme.sub-title: Wads of Bills Blossomed in the Sunset of Rio

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An old man who supposedly knows the secret to Hitler's legacy lives in East Germany within the Berlin Wall. Lupin and his gang track the old man down, but the old man can't recall anything about any legacy.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: At Loch Ness in Scotland, the mysterious monster Nessie reveals itself from the lake, charmed by Fujiko's singing. Seeing this, Doctor Oz decides to use Fujiko to capture Nessie for his personal gain.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko and a mystery man have an enticing job for Lupin: Stealing a ton of gold bullion from a Swiss Bank, a bank renowned for its tight security. Can it be done? What is the mystery man's true identity?
programme.sub-title: I'll Teach You How to Transport Gold Bars

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A man is threatening to destroy the Leaning Tower of Pisa with a device that generates artificial earthquakes. The Italian government has no choice but to meet the culprit's, but Lupin takes the ransom for himself!
programme.sub-title: Will the Leaving Tower of Pisa Be Standing?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the golden death mask of Tutankhamen, the ancient Egyptian pharaoh known as the "boy king." However, when Lupin tries on the golden death mask he becomes possessed by an ominous curse.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Trans Europe Superexpress train has departed Venice and is headed to France. Onboard the Superexpress is crime boss Don Marcino's ill-gotten treasures. Can Lupin and his gang pull off the heist before the train reaches its destination?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin meets the grandson of master Ukiyoe artist, Toushusai Sharaku and learns that he has been switching his own works with his grandfather's originals. Unable to switch the last painting due to illness, he asks Lupin to switch it in his stead.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko have been invited to a party hosted by Marcel Dulane, a member of Paris' high society. However, the elegant party turns out to be a trap. Fujiko is taken hostage and Lupin, with a time-bomb belt strapped to his waist

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is in Monaco to race his new toy in the Monaco Grand Prix. Or so he thought. Lupin ends up losing both his money and race car in a fixed poker game at the casino.
programme.sub-title: Bet on the Monaco Grand Prix!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A rare bottle of Bordeaux, commissioned by Napoleon for his beloved wife, Josephine, is to be given to the President of the United States as a Christmas present.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A criminal gang has hidden a microfilm containing the manufacturing process for artificial diamonds, developed by NASA, in one of Inspector Zenigata's molars. Determined to get his hands on that microfilm, Lupin must capture Inspector Zenigata.
programme.sub-title: The Great Chase in San Francisco

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Forward Hees, the world's richest man, suddenly dies a mysterious death and leaves a large ruby to Fujiko in his will. After inheriting the ruby, Fujiko comes down with the same mysterious fever as Hees
programme.sub-title: Big Adventure of the Caribbean Sea

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A Count challenges Lupin to steal a gemstone named Dracula's Tear from on board his airship, the Hendenburg. However, also on board the ship are several formidable detectives: Homes III, Detective Archer, Koojisuke Kaneda and Inspector Zenigata.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is suffering from Transformation Sickness, an illness that transforms him into a cruel, cold-blooded criminal at the stroke of midnight, and leaves him with no recollection of his murderous crime spree in the morning

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A small Arab nation has received a blackmail notice. Pay a $100 million or have their oil fields blown up. Lupin targets the money, but his plans are hindered when he finds out the culprits are using human bombs.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Black Panther, the world's largest emerald, gets its name from the black panther that appears inside it when a light shines on it at a particular angle. After capturing this one-of-a-kind emerald, Lupin hides it in a museum to retrieve it later

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Vault maker Marukin Safe Company is forced into bankruptcy after Lupin cracks open their impenetrable safes. To test his own skills, Marukin's son challenges Lupin to open a safe he has designed

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: While trying to snag General Hatler's prize medallion, which contains a fifty-carat ruby, Lupin inadvertently reels in Hatler's biggest secret, his toupee! An enraged General Hatler orders Lupin and his gang to be killed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Upon returning to Japan, Goemon finds his master on the brink of death. Furthermore, Jinkuro, a fellow disciple, had stolen half of the scroll containing the Secret Arts of the Iga Ninja. Will Goemon be able to avenge his master?

programme.title: Gattaca, (1997, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Ethan Hawke, Uma Thurman, Alan Arkin and Jude Law star in this engrossing sci-fi thriller about an all-too-human man who dares to defy a system obsessed with genetic perfection. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: Brightburn, (2019, B-Movie Horror)
programme.desc: What if a child from another world crash-landed on Earth, but instead of becoming a hero to mankind, he proved to be something far more sinister?

programme.title: World War Z, (2013, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: World War Z is the fast-paced, pulse-pounding epic of the potential last days of the human race. Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt) is called in to help stop the pandemic that has spread around the world.

programme.title: District 9, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth suddenly find a kindred spirit in a government agent that is exposed to their biotechnology.

programme.title: Moon, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Sam Bell (Sam Rockwell) is nearing the completion of his 3-year-long contract with Lunar Industries, mining Earth's primary source of energy on the dark side of the moon.

programme.title: Gattaca, (1997, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Ethan Hawke, Uma Thurman, Alan Arkin and Jude Law star in this engrossing sci-fi thriller about an all-too-human man who dares to defy a system obsessed with genetic perfection. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: The Terminator, (1984, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A cyborg is sent from the future to assassinate a young woman who's destined to give birth to a son who will become the key to saving humanity.

programme.title: Overlord, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Nothing can prepare you for the mind-blowing mayhem that is Overlord. Mega producer J.J. Abrams creates an insanely twisted thrill ride about a team of American troops who come face-to-face with Nazi super-soldiers unlike the world has ever seen.

programme.title: World War Z, (2013, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: World War Z is the fast-paced, pulse-pounding epic of the potential last days of the human race. Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt) is called in to help stop the pandemic that has spread around the world.

programme.title: The Alamo, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: John Wayne produces, directs and stars in this retelling of the Alamo, a battle in which 185 men joined together against an army of 7,000. Filmed entirely in Texas, "The Alamo" is a visually stunning and historically accurate celebration of courage.

programme.title: Hondo, (1953, Drama)
programme.desc: John Wayne plays Hondo Lane, a cavalry rider who becomes the protector of Angie Lowe as well as a father figure to her boy, Johnny. Angie, determinedly awaiting the return of her husband, refuses to leave their homestead despite the growing danger.

programme.title: El Dorado, (1966, Drama)
programme.desc: Robert Mitchum plays to perfection an alcoholic but gutsy sheriff who relentlessly battles the dark side of the wild West, ruthless cattle barons and crooked businessmen.

programme.title: Big Jake, (1971, Drama)
programme.desc: An aging Texas cattle man who has outlived his time swings into action when outlaws kidnap his grandson and wound his son.

programme.title: McLintock!, (1963, Drama)
programme.desc: The cattle rancher McLintock (John Wayne) puts his brand on the territory and every woman in it! Louise Warren plays a widow who moves with her two children onto McLintocks ranch to serve as cook, while Maureen OHara plays the estranged wife.

programme.title: Sioux City Sue, (1946, Drama)
programme.desc: A talent scout searches for a cowboy singer to do the voice for a cartoon character happens upon Gene Autry, who reluctantly takes the job, not knowing he is to be the voice of an animated donkey!

programme.title: Robin Hood Of Texas, (1947, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry and the Cass County Boys are unjustly arrested as bank bandits. Released by police as decoys to locate the loot, Gene and the boys find themselves in trouble with the real bank robbers.

programme.title: Saddle Pals, (1947, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry goes to the home of hypochondriac landowner, who gets Gene to switch identities while he takes a vacation, giving Gene power-of-attorney. Gene has to raise $50,000 to save the properties.

programme.title: Zorro, (1975, Drama)
programme.desc: In the New World, a new Spanish governor finds the province of Nueva Aragn under the iron fist of the corrupt Colonel Huerta and vows to bring justice under the guise of a masked avenger.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle, (2003, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: The "Angels", three investigative agents (Barrymore, Diaz and Liu) who work for the Charles Townsend Detective Agency, return for another high-octane series of adventures as they investigate the theft of a database of witness protection profiles.

programme.title: No Country For Old Men, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Winner of four Academy Awards, including Best Picture, filmmakers Joel and Ethan Coen (FARGO) bring to the screen a thrilling bestseller in which a crime-scene's irresistible stolen loot sets forth an unstoppable chain reaction of violence.

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin', (2005, Musical)
programme.desc: Following a near-fatal gun battle, Marcus recalls his journey from orphaned street kid from the Bronx to making his mark in the drug trade to teaming up with a fellow ex-con (Terrence Howard) for his shot at becoming a successful rap artist.

programme.title: Changing Lanes, (2002, Thriller)
programme.desc: Late for court, an attorney weaves in and out of traffic. In a different lane, a father whose right to see his children rests on getting to court on time. A minor accident will turn these two strangers into beasts.

programme.title: Identity, (2003, Thriller)
programme.desc: What if every choice we ever make was already made for us? What if there really were no coincidences in life and our destinies were already predetermined? Ten strangers with secrets are brought together in a savage rainstorm. Rated: R

programme.desc: The girls search for a vacation spot so they can focus on training. Instead, they settle on a mansion that has a very eerie service staff.

programme.desc: Ami spots Nephrite and follows him to an animation studio that is making the Sailor V movie. Ami calls Usagi and Rei so they can investigate.

programme.desc: Naru has fallen in love with Masato Sanjoin. Knowing that Sanjoin is really Nephrite, Usagi tries to convince Naru to give up on her feelings.

programme.desc: Usagi and Naru attend an art exhibit by Yumemi Yumeno. Usagi and Mamoru are both asked by Yumemi to become models for her latest painting.

programme.desc: Grandpa Hino has become emotionally unstable, causing Rei to worry. The new apprentice Yuichiro tries to cheer her up.

programme.desc: Usagi and friends meet a girl who they believe holds the final Rainbow Crystal. But they realize its her pet cat that possesses the Rainbow Crystal!

programme.desc: Umino seems to have fallen in love with Naru. Naru only considers Umino a friend, so Usagi decides to play Cupid and urges them to go on a date.

programme.desc: Usagi is haunted by dreams of Tuxedo Mask, who has been abducted by the Dark Kingdom. Minako takes Usagi to a popular hair salon hoping it will help.

programme.desc: Usagi and her friends go to a ski resort to participate in the Moon Princess Contest, unaware that its Kunzites plan to eliminate the Moon Princess.

programme.title: Linha de Ao
programme.desc: O prefeito contrata um ex-policial para investigar quem o amante de sua esposa. Apesar de suas antigas discordncias, ele aceita a tarefa, mas logo descobre as reais intenes por trs da investigao encomendada.

programme.title: Matador de Aluguel
programme.desc: Joe um detetive, mas tambm um assassino por encomenda. Quando Chris, um traficante, tem seu estoque roubado pela prpria me, ele resolve contratar os servios de 'Killer Joe' para se livrar da morte usando o dinheiro do seguro de vida de sua me.

programme.desc: Um homem deprimido conhece um fabricante de sabonetes, e juntos formam um clube de luta clandestino que evolui para algo inesperado.

programme.title: Megaterremoto
programme.desc: Enquanto um terremoto de enorme proporo ameaa atingir a cidade de So Francisco, uma equipe de especialistas em desastres naturais trabalha para salvar o maior nmero de vidas possvel antes que a cidade seja completamente destruda.

programme.title: O Alvo Final
programme.desc: Depois de matar o dono de um bar em uma briga, Bobby Kalinowsky, um ex-membro do SEAL, deve procurar sua filha sequestrada.

programme.title: Sem Perdo
programme.desc: Victor trabalha com um grande criminoso. Um dia, ele encontra Beatrice, vtima de um crime, que pede a ajuda de Victor para ajud-la em sua vingana. Para convenc-lo a cooperar, ela o chantageira com provas de um assassinato que Victor cometeu.

programme.title: O Guardio
programme.desc: Um policial de Los Angeles voa para o Novo Mxico para trabalhar como guarda-costas para a filha de um poderoso empresrio. Quando gangsters a sequestram, ele os procura para resgat-la e proteg-la.

programme.title: O Sequestro do nibus 657
programme.desc: Um pai no tem meios para pagar o tratamento mdico da filha. Como ltimo recurso, ele se une a um colega de trabalho ganancioso para roubar um cassino. Quando as coisas do errado, eles so forados a sequestrar um nibus da cidade.

programme.title: Assassino Americano
programme.desc: O gngster americano Erik Vasquez est planejando se tornar o principal chefe do submundo mexicano, apenas para se ver fazendo inimigos tanto dos poderosos cartis quanto de seus prprios aliados.

programme.title: Sem Perdo
programme.desc: Victor trabalha com um grande criminoso. Um dia, ele encontra Beatrice, vtima de um crime, que pede a ajuda de Victor para ajud-la em sua vingana. Para convenc-lo a cooperar, ela o chantageira com provas de um assassinato que Victor cometeu.

programme.title: Ninja
programme.desc: Casey um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japo para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instruo progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendrio Yoroi Bitsu, um ba blindado contendo as armas do ltimo Ninja Koga.

programme.title: O Justiceiro
programme.desc: Um policial problemtico disfarado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacvel. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se v lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua famlia.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caador de Encrenca
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresrio em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A Retaliao
programme.desc: Kurt Sloan prometeu a si mesmo que no voltaria para a Tailndia, mas algum o seda e o fora a retornar ao pas asitico.

programme.title: Ip Man - O Mestre do Kung Fu
programme.desc: Durante o tempo em que foi capito da polcia na cidade de Foshan, Ip Man perseguido por um gngster vingativo, enquanto o exrcito japons invade a regio.

programme.title: Clube da Luta
programme.desc: Um homem deprimido conhece um fabricante de sabonetes, e juntos formam um clube de luta clandestino que evolui para algo inesperado.

programme.title: Loucos Por Dinheiro
programme.desc: Diretor de presdio obriga dois homens a se casarem com suas filhas, por acreditar que elas estejam grvidas. Os novos cunhados decidem roubar um trem e fugir. Enquanto isso, uma agente do FBI chega cidade para investigar a morte de um prisioneiro.

programme.title: Deus nos Acuda!
programme.desc: Entrega especial para fs de comdia! Greg Kinnear (Auto Focus) estrela este filme agradvel dirigido por Garry Marshall (Uma Linda Mulher) sobre um trapaceiro sem nenhum valor que passa a se dar bem.

programme.title: Os Sete Suspeitos
programme.desc: Descubra todos os suspeitos e todas as suas artimanhas. Voc amar presenciar suas atrapalhadas enquanto no nmero de mortes e risadas aumenta perante seus olhos.

programme.title: ESCOLA DE IDIOTAS (2006)
programme.desc: Um jovem azarado se inscreve em um curso para ganhar confiana e ajudar a conquistar a garota dos seus sonhos, mas as coisas se complicam quando o professor tem o mesmo plano.

programme.title: Loucas por Amor, Viciadas em Dinheiro
programme.desc: Com Diane Keaton, Queen Latifah e Katie Holmes. Depois que seu marido perde o emprego, uma dona de casa comea a trabalhar limpando a Casa da Moeda e tem uma ideia: chamar suas amigas para roubar notas de dinheiro que seriam destrudas.

programme.title: Caindo na Estrada
programme.desc: Quando um vdeo muito picante de Josh (Breckin Meyer) ficando muito louco com a sensual Beth (Amy Smart) enviado acidentalmente para sua namorada, ele tem trs dias para chegar ao Texas antes que a fita chegue!

programme.title: O Chamado de Xangai
programme.desc: Um advogado de Nova York enviado a Xangai a negcios e logo enfrenta muitos problemas com a lei.

programme.title: Terapia do Sexo
programme.desc: Um viciado em sexo em recuperao tenta cortejar uma nova namorada que sente a necessidade de expressar sua intensa sexualidade.

programme.title: Como conquistar uma Mulher
programme.desc: Andy Conners no faz ideia de como satisfazer as necessidades sexuais de sua namorada, Lauren Baker. Ele pede conselhos a seus amigos e a uma famosa atriz porno.

programme.title: A Servio de Sara
programme.desc: Sara Moore recebe os papis do divrcio e percebe que corre o risco de perder milhes. Ela convence o oficial de justia Joe Tyler a ajud-la a lidar com seu ex-marido e, para isso, fazem juntos uma viagem pelo pas.

programme.title: Qual seu nmero?
programme.desc: Ally quer encontrar o melhor ex-namorado que j teve com medo de nunca mais amar de verdade.

programme.title: A Famlia da Noiva
programme.desc: Um casal tem uma grande surpresa quando sua filha anuncia seu casamento no dia da sua boda de prata.

programme.title: Outono em Nova York
programme.desc: Will Keane um playboy cinquento que tem como promessa nunca ter um compromisso srio com uma mulher. Quando ele conhece Charlotte Fielding ,imagina que ter com ela outro rpido e fcil romance. Mas nada no relacionamento de ambos fcil ou rpido.

programme.title: Uma Viagem Para Paris
programme.desc: Lucas, um rico empresrio francs, vai a Montana para uma proposta de negcio muito atraente. L, ele conhece Robin, se apaixona e a leva para Paris em uma incrvel aventura de Natal. Mas ser que os negcios acabaro com esse romance?

programme.title: Um romance proibido
programme.desc: Um veterano tenta se assimilar de volta vida civil em um pas que ele mal reconhece enquanto tenta conquistar o corao de uma imigrante iraquiana, mas esse romance improvvel posto prova quando ela se depara com a perspectiva de deportao.

programme.title: Festividades do Chocolate Quente

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E20

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo se encontram com Shinosuke, que est procurando por sua noiva. Eles so agrupados em uma vila s de mulheres e so separados.

programme.title: The Untouchables (1987)
programme.desc: Though Prohibition agent Eliot Ness attempts to take Al Capone down, even his best efforts fail due to widespread corruption within the Windy Citys police force.

programme.desc: A talented high school basketball players (Taylor John Smith) dreams of playing college ball are jeopardized by his hard-drinking fathers (Michael Shannon) compulsive gambling.

programme.title: The Running Man (1987)
programme.desc: A police-state scapegoat (Arnold Schwarzenegger) must play a TV hosts (Richard Dawson) deadly game show for the 21st-century masses.

programme.title: Man With No Past (2025)

programme.desc: An ex-convict (Ben Affleck) wants to start a new life with his girlfriend (Charlize Theron), but her brother (Gary Sinise) involves him in a scheme to rob a casino.

programme.title: Guns Up (2025)
programme.desc: After a job goes horribly wrong, a man who moonlights as a mob henchman has one night to get his family out of the city while keeping his dark secret hidden.

programme.title: Goodfellas (1990)
programme.desc: Henry Hill, a poor Irish-Italian growing up in 1950s New York City, rises through the ranks of his neighborhoods organized crime branch; he ends up in the FBIs witness protection program after testifying against his former partners.

programme.desc: A defense contractor hires an ex-marine to go to Panama to complete an arms deal. In the process, he becomes involved in the U.S. invasion of Panama.

programme.desc: A soldier uses his military training to rescue the kidnapped daughter of his dead friend.
